bidnessetc.com/2015/04/boeing-co-upgrade.title: Boeing Co. Upgrades Renton Plant To Boost 737 Production...
bidnessetc.com/2015/04/boeing-co-upgrade.snippet: Boeing Co (NYSE:BA) is upgrading its Renton plant, which manufactures the single-aisle 737 commercial aircraft. The company aims to increase its monthly production of 737 from 42 to 52 commercial aircraft by the end of fiscal year 2018 (FY18).
